title: If Only We Knew
description: Part of "My Best Friend" series.If Only We Knew, is a story about two people who understand what it is to love each other, with passion, patience and understanding. For better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, until death do them part.Life is full of surprises.Matt Johnston married the wrong woman for all the right reasons, but canâ€™t stop thinking about another. When he thought he knew what was ahead, life threw him a curve ball.Shannon Jones had always known what she wanted out of life, until one night of drunken passion changes her way of thinking.This book contains explicit sexual content.
author: Ancelli
